publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4675 Mrs Nanette Milne: Inverurie Environment Day 2006â€”That the Parliament welcomes Inverurie Environment Day which takes place on Saturday 29 July 2006; notes that Inverurie Environment Day is a celebration of our local environment and a shop window full of ideas and advice on how to lead an environmentally-friendly lifestyle; also notes that the event has attracted more than 25 exhibitors ranging from local groups such as Baillies of Bennachie and Inverurie Horticultural Society to national organisations such as the RSPB and Keep Scotland Beautiful; further notes that the day also provides an opportunity to both celebrate, and recognise the need to protect, our natural heritage and to recognise how everyone can play their part, and congratulates the Inverurie Environmental Improvement Group, Inverurie Business Association, Inverurie Community Council, the Rotary Club of Inverurie and Aberdeenshire Council on organising and supporting the event. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, John Scott*, Murdo Fraser*, Mark Ballard*, Dave Petrie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4675 Inverurie Environment Day 2006 (lodged on 24 July 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Eleanor Scott*
